advertising.imaging_profile: High-end commercial advertising photography, polished, persuasive, 8k, professional color grading

composition_rule.zh: 平面设计感，海报式构图

product_photography.imaging_profile: Industrial product photography, studio lighting, sharp focus, realistic textures, controlled reflections, authentic camera noise

lighting_rule.en: soft directional studio light, strong material definition
lighting_rule.zh: 柔和定向影棚光，强调材质

concept_art.imaging_profile: Concept artwork, gallery print, mixed-media or staged installation feel, material emphasis over realism, no catalog, no studio product lighting

stage_context.en: empty room with subtle institutional feel
stage_context.zh: 带有微妙机构感的空房间
放着过期杂志的候诊室

lighting_rule.en: cool ambient light with a single warm source

documentary.imaging_profile: Candid documentary frame, available light, motion blur allowed, ISO noise allowed, storytelling moment, 35mm lens

meme_logic.imaging_profile: Realistic UI screenshot OR screen capture, flat lighting, system fonts, vector edges, compression artifacts

composition_rule.zh: 带有粗体文本块的海报
带标签页的浏览器窗口

lighting_rule.zh: 扁平 UI 光照 (无电影感)
高对比度 UI 元素

secondary_elements.zh: Comic Sans 字体法律文本

miniature_fantasy.imaging_profile: Macro photography, tilt-shift effect, shallow depth of field, miniature world, vibrant colors

core_tension.zh: 微小劳作 vs 巨大物体
异想天开 vs 真实材质

composition_rule.en: macro lens, shallow depth of field

lighting_rule.en: warm practical light with soft shadows
lighting_rule.zh: 温暖实用光配柔和阴影

lighting_rule.en: golden hour warm glow tiny world
lighting_rule.zh: 黄金时段温暖微型世界
聚光灯戏剧性迷你场景
